verses.verse: Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Job <S%H347><s%> out of the whirlwind <S%H5591><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>,
Who is this that darkens <S%H2821><s%> counsel <S%H6098><s%> by words <S%H4405><s%> outside knowledge <S%H1847><s%>?
Clothe up <S%H247><s%> now your body <S%H2504><s%> like a man <S%H1397><s%>; for I will demand <S%H7592><s%> of you <S%H3045><s%>, and answer you me.
Where <S%H375><s%> were you when I laid the foundations <S%H3245><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>? declare <S%H5046><s%>, if you have <S%H3045><s%> understanding <S%H998><s%>.
Who has laid <S%H7760><s%> the measures <S%H4461><s%> there <S%H3045><s%>, if you know? or who has stretched <S%H5186><s%> the line upon it <S%H6957><s%>?
Whereupon are the foundations <S%H134><s%> there fastened <S%H2883><s%>? or who laid <S%H3384><s%> the corner <S%H6438><s%> stone there <S%H68><s%>;
When the morning <S%H1242><s%> stars <S%H3556><s%> sang <S%H7442><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>, and all the sons <S%H1121><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> shouted for joy <S%H7321><s%>?
Or who shut up <S%H5526><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> with doors <S%H1817><s%>, when it broke forth <S%H1518><s%>, as if it had issued out <S%H3318><s%> of the womb <S%H7358><s%>?
When I made <S%H7760><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> the garment <S%H3830><s%> there <S%H6205><s%>, and thick darkness a swaddlingband for it <S%H2854><s%>,
And broke up <S%H7665><s%> for it my decreed <S%H2706><s%> place <S%H7760><s%>, and set bars <S%H1280><s%> and doors <S%H1817><s%>,
And said <S%H559><s%>, Here <S%H5704><s%> shall you come <S%H935><s%>, but no further <S%H3254><s%>: and here shall your proud <S%H1347><s%> waves <S%H1530><s%> be stayed <S%H7896><s%>?
Have you commanded <S%H6680><s%> the morning <S%H1242><s%> since your days <S%H3117><s%>; and caused the dayspring <S%H7837><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> his place <S%H4725><s%>;
That it might take hold <S%H270><s%> of the ends <S%H3671><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, that the wicked <S%H7563><s%> might be shaken out of it <S%H5287><s%>?
It is turned <S%H2015><s%> as clay <S%H2563><s%> to the seal <S%H2368><s%>; and they stand <S%H3320><s%> as a garment <S%H3830><s%>.
And from the wicked <S%H7563><s%> their light <S%H216><s%> is withheld <S%H4513><s%>, and the high <S%H7311><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%> shall be broken <S%H7665><s%>.
Have you entered <S%H935><s%> into the springs <S%H5033><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>? or have you walked <S%H1980><s%> in the search <S%H2714><s%> of the depth <S%H8415><s%>?
Have the gates <S%H8179><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%> been opened <S%H1540><s%> unto you <S%H7200><s%>? or have you seen the doors <S%H8179><s%> of the shadow of death <S%H6757><s%>?
Have you perceived <S%H995><s%> the breadth <S%H7338><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>? Declare <S%H5046><s%> if you know it all <S%H3045><s%>.
Where is the way <S%H1870><s%> where light <S%H216><s%> dwells <S%H7931><s%>? and as for darkness <S%H2822><s%>, where is the place there <S%H4725><s%>,
That you should take <S%H3947><s%> it to the bound <S%H1366><s%> there <S%H995><s%>, and that you should know the paths <S%H5410><s%> to the house there <S%H1004><s%>?
Know <S%H3045><s%> you it <S%H3205><s%>, because you were then born? or because the number <S%H4557><s%> of your days <S%H3117><s%> is great <S%H7227><s%>?
Have you entered <S%H935><s%> into the treasures <S%H214><s%> of the snow <S%H7950><s%>? or have you seen <S%H7200><s%> the treasures <S%H214><s%> of the hail <S%H1259><s%>,
Which I have reserved <S%H2820><s%> against the time <S%H6256><s%> of trouble <S%H6862><s%>, against the day <S%H3117><s%> of battle <S%H7128><s%> and war <S%H4421><s%>?
By what <S%H335><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> is the light <S%H216><s%> parted <S%H2505><s%>, which scatters <S%H6327><s%> the east wind <S%H6921><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>?
Who has divided <S%H6385><s%> a watercourse <S%H8585><s%> for the overflowing of waters <S%H7858><s%>, or a way <S%H1870><s%> for the lightning <S%H2385><s%> of thunder <S%H6963><s%>;
To cause it to rain <S%H4305><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%>, where no man <S%H376><s%> is <S%H4057><s%>; on the wilderness, where there is no man <S%H120><s%>;
To satisfy <S%H7646><s%> the desolate <S%H7722><s%> and waste <S%H4875><s%> ground <S%H4161><s%>; and to cause the bud of the tender herb <S%H1877><s%> to spring forth <S%H6779><s%>?
Has <S%H3426><s%> the rain <S%H4306><s%> a father <S%H1><s%>? or who has fathered <S%H3205><s%> the drops <S%H96><s%> of dew <S%H2919><s%>?
Out of whose womb <S%H990><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> the ice <S%H7140><s%>? and the hoary frost <S%H3713><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, who has birthed it <S%H3205><s%>?
The waters <S%H4325><s%> are hid <S%H2244><s%> as with a stone <S%H68><s%>, and the face <S%H6440><s%> of the deep <S%H8415><s%> is frozen <S%H3920><s%>.
Can you bind <S%H7194><s%> the sweet influences <S%H4575><s%> of Pleiades <S%H3598><s%>, or loose <S%H6605><s%> the bands <S%H4189><s%> of Orion <S%H3685><s%>?
Can you bring forth <S%H3318><s%> Mazzaroth <S%H4216><s%> in his season <S%H6256><s%>? or can you guide <S%H5148><s%> Arcturus <S%H5906><s%> with his sons <S%H1121><s%>?
Know <S%H3045><s%> you the ordinances <S%H2708><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>? can you set <S%H7760><s%> the dominion <S%H4896><s%> there in the earth <S%H776><s%>?
Can you lift up <S%H7311><s%> your voice <S%H6963><s%> to the clouds <S%H5645><s%>, that abundance <S%H8229><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%> may cover you <S%H3680><s%>?
Can you send <S%H7971><s%> lightnings <S%H1300><s%>, that they may go <S%H3212><s%>, and say unto you <S%H559><s%>, Here we are?
Who has put <S%H7896><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> in the inward parts <S%H2910><s%>? or who has given <S%H5414><s%> understanding <S%H998><s%> to the heart <S%H7907><s%>?
Who can number <S%H5608><s%> the clouds <S%H7834><s%> in wisdom <S%H2451><s%>? or who can stay <S%H7901><s%> the bottles <S%H5035><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>,
When the dust <S%H6083><s%> grows <S%H3332><s%> into hardness <S%H4165><s%>, and the clods <S%H7263><s%> cleave fast together <S%H1692><s%>?
Will you hunt <S%H6679><s%> the prey <S%H2964><s%> for the lion <S%H3833><s%>? or fill <S%H4390><s%> the appetite <S%H2416><s%> of the young lions <S%H3715><s%>,
When they couch <S%H7817><s%> in their dens <S%H4585><s%>, and stay <S%H3427><s%> in the covert <S%H5521><s%> to <S%H3926><s%> lie in wait <S%H695><s%>?

Who provides <S%H3559><s%> for the raven <S%H6158><s%> his food <S%H6718><s%>? when his young ones <S%H3206><s%> cry <S%H7768><s%> unto God <S%H410><s%>, they wander <S%H8582><s%> for lack <S%H1097><s%> of food <S%H400><s%>.
